ngiemboon: À kyɛbɛ pwó lé shǔ we gẅie á kɔʼɔ́ ńtyé ngʉ̀a shʉ̀shʉ̀a.
en: He called his friend by the hand.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ saŋá zoon, á kẅɛ nkÿo lé menzèm.
en: They counted the plums and it came out to a hundred and a little more.

ngiemboon: Á té ye njú wɔ́. Á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ye nna nǎ.
en: It is not purchased. It's free.
